text:
ROOT.war does not correctly unpack if contains context.xml with a path="" attribute.

Issue has been reported already for the 5.0.28 version. And workaround was: Put
docBase="ROOT.war" inside context.xml.
Same issue exists on 5.0.30 but above workaround does not help.

I have descovered way how to force Tomcat to unpack it:
Replace docBase="ROOT.war" with absolute path for an example
docBase="/var/lib/tomcat5/webapps/ROOT.war"

ROOT.war and ROOT are special keywords.  You can use your workaround, you can go
back to 5.0.28 and use that version's workaround, you can stop using ROOT /
ROOT.war as names (since you can just call it myapp.war and have path=""
inside), or you can upgrade to 5.5.
